channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer and Here
channel.desc: Aniwa performs with LGBTQI+ kapa Ahakoa te Aha, and hangs back stage with Half Queen before her headlining set at the Big Gay Out. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Under The Wh?riki
channel.desc: NEW: A video podcast confronting kaupapa often silenced or hidden within te ao M?ori. This series lifts the metaphorical wh?riki to expose and explore issues we often shy away from.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Knock and the door will open. Haki and Geo cover their tracks; Kid and Kuini set their sights high; and Thomas finds an enlightening path. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Floundering
channel.desc: Charlie and her granddad Roger ride to the beach to go floundering. Possibly for the last time. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: My Daughter is Coming
channel.desc: NEW: A young woman reluctantly returns home to her mother, whose lifestyle she tried not to emulate, realising they are similar in many ways and that is okay.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).

channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Whang?rei to uncover the story behind the sacred maunga Parihaka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Tired of this weird game, Josh decides it's time to go home but is soon running for his life from creatures emerging from a strange bone-lined fort. (R).

channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Life Wharekura
channel.desc: Follow reigning champions, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae, as they compete against other kura tuarua at Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024 in Whakat?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. In this episode they have their very first get-together. Here we meet the performers of this new group. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tautohetohe
channel.desc: M?ori wordplay and wit in action as two teams go head-to-head on a given topic. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Digital Drum Studio Sessions
channel.desc: NEW: APTN?s Digital Drum Studio Sessions provide an up-close and personal look at some of today?s hottest Indigenous artists and the process they use to create their music.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Someday Challenge
channel.desc: A film making challenge for rangatahi to tell stories about issues they care about. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Digital Drum Studio Sessions
channel.desc: NEW: APTN?s Digital Drum Studio Sessions provide an up-close and personal look at some of today?s hottest Indigenous artists and the process they use to create their music.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Outlook For Someday
channel.desc: A story about the importance of keeping te reo M?ori alive and thriving in New Zealand. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Our Other Islands
channel.desc: Troy is in the Bay of Islands meeting M?ori and P?keh? locals who all want the best for their islands. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer And Here Series 2
channel.desc: Actress Awa Puna found herself on the frontline protesting against anti-trans activists. With so much anti-trans rhetoric in the world how do trans people in Aotearoa stay safe and resilient? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hifi Ulu
channel.desc: As his tenth birthday approaches, Luka must navigate a profound Niuean rite of passage, where the weight of his heritage and the dawn of his autonomy converge in a single moment. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Man Outside
channel.desc: Abandoned by the law, a woman?s flatmates struggle to protect her from a relentless stalker, forcing them all to become the protagonists in a real-life thriller.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: What was once a traditional love song becomes a celebration of universal love and connection in te reo M?ori, when iconic band The Black Seeds revisit their anthemic tune "?So True'. (R).

channel.title: Ahik?roa

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Debbs Murray has trained over 3,000 frontline workers. She is a family violence practitioner with her own powerful story of lived experience. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: We share the personal stories of Sammie and Lydia and their forming of the New Zealand Hague Collective to help women navigate this terrifying international law. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. At an amazing drop in centre in South Auckland, an unlikely love story shows how people's lives can be transformed by the power of a community that cares. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Now housed, Carmen is giving back to the community although Six is surprised to hear how much she misses her old life. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Georgia Lines opens up about her uncertainty as P?keh? taking on the challenge of performing in te reo M?ori. (R).

channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: The gang gate-crash Ma's weekly wh?nau dinner. Over the course of the evening, Ma clashes with her mum, Pua gets drunk, and Taaps and Tawhiti have an incident involving a water blaster. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Emerging young singer Nikau Grace always felt judged, often being told she wasn't M?ori enough. Now she is taking back her power and confidence in her M?ori identity. (R).

channel.title: Tautohetohe

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai is grief-stricken in the wharekai before she remembers Mihi and Ngaru. Wai and Mihi andNgaru are ushered by the spirits into the forest. From there they will never forget their home, and as their people have always done, they too will carry on... (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapu Te Ranga Marae
channel.desc: Gives us the rich history of the Marae and introduces us to Kaumatua Bruce Stewart in the last years of his life. We learn about 'living Maori' in an extraordinary Marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Frontier
channel.desc: As the United States advances west, what appeared to be a boundless empty terrain was a richly inhabited landscape of diverse indigenous peoples not about to surrender their lands without a fight. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: NEW: The wh?nau travel to T?maki Makaurau to meet with Ng?ti Wh?tua leader, Joe Pihema. Graham Tipene?s art installation, Waimahara, makes the wh?nau feel comfortable in the hustle & bustle of the city.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Room
channel.desc: A woman and her young son escape captivity and must adjust to life in the real world. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the origins of thermal energy and how it was brought from Hawaiki to Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After escaping the slimy, scale-covered ponaturi, Josh, Kazumi, Rangi, Kura, and Toro decide to search the creatures' village for the godstick. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. We get to see how their first practice is going and whether they learnt the new songs and haka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Frontier
channel.desc: As the United States advances west, what appeared to be a boundless empty terrain was a richly inhabited landscape of diverse indigenous peoples not about to surrender their lands without a fight. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Room
channel.desc: A woman and her young son escape captivity and must adjust to life in the real world. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura is in Auckland to taste the vibrant flavours of Pacific Island fine dining restaurant Tala, The Fresh Grower, a free-range chicken farm and Jungle 8. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: The village is excited as they prepare for a Grand Feast with ex-soldiers turned farmers. We meet the Kuia-Gang as they weave and gossip about the events of the day. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Mihi (8) doesn't understand why they are hosting the farmers so Kuia explains the situation to her. Wai is suspicious of the Pa?keha?. Kuia drops some wisdom on how to deal with their big emotions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. (R).

channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Life In The FFN
channel.desc: See the stories of people who are at different stages of 'rangatiratanga' in their community. A familiar face in the FFN is Samson Murray aka JAMB Just Another M?ori Boy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: 1.5 Degrees
channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Corban and Toby are two aspiring architects looking at climate resilient architecture. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: Doting parents Aaron and Raka are searching for help for their daughter who is struggling with the transition to school. Nathan suspects her issues may stretch beyond what her parents think. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Dan Carter: A Perfect 10
channel.desc: Behind-the-scenes access to Dan Carter and his family, tracing the journey from rural New Zealand to the top of the world. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit Kipu Ranch Adventures and Kawiti Caves. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).

channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: The wh?nau set up a surprise birthday for their Nanny Del. Lead voice of Coco Reo M?ori, M?nuera, and his whanau perform at a screening of the movie. (R).

channel.title: Hui Hoppers
channel.desc: The marae is hosting a 1st birthday party, complete with water activities, face painting, and cake. Anahera runs in to some trouble but it's nothing Kura isn't prepared to try and fix. (R).

channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).
